changelog.change: Publishing for LiveSplit for the first time.
AutoSplitter detects player getting out of bed for the first time, then splits every new region and once the end screen prompt is shown.
Returning to main menu before reaching the ending will reset the timer.
Fixed pointer paths to required types and fields
Since I did not find the time to update for 1.10 before 1.11 was released, there will be no release for v1.10 unfortunately
